backend/main.mo: Backend actor defining course data, gallery and review image storage, user profiles, contact info, international inquiries, and access-controlled profile operations with storage and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented client-side image error handling for the Mission section with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of autogenerated summaries describing the purpose and behavior of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining OKLCH color tokens for the red‑white‑black theme and dark-mode variants.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting favicon, preloading the brand logo, loading fonts, and mounting the frontend app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router and theme setup defining all application routes and rendering the layout with Toaster notifications.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Reusable logo component displaying the HR Academy logo with optional text and error handling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing brand logo, quick links, contact info, and founder attribution using dynamic backend contact data.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with brand logo, navigation links, and a Contact Us button for desktop and mobile.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout component wrapping pages with header, footer, and main content outlet.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity authentication with query cache clearing.
frontend/src/constants/brandAssets.ts: Centralized constant exporting the canonical HR Academy brand logo path.
frontend/src/constants/missionAssets.ts: Exports a constant pointing to the fixed mission image asset path.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, and persisted identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as courses, gallery images, contact info, and reviews.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining global styles, theme variables, and utility classes including red accent variants.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard for managing courses, gallery images, contact info, and reviews with various CRUD forms.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact page with contact info, links, and a form for international inquiries.
frontend/src/pages/CoursesPage.tsx: Fetches and groups courses by category, rendering category badges and course cards with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Loads and displays gallery images in a responsive grid with hover effects, falling back to skeletons or placeholder images.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the main homepage with hero content, highlights, reviews, and mission image handling, including review submission logic.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin setup for the project.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, issues, and feature requests related to fixing the missing Mission section image.
